"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b268af-fee4-402b-27d1-1def5f45b8e7#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A koronázás egyéb kellékei</string>
            <string language="en">other accessories of coronation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">andere Zusatzgeräte der Krönung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">d'autres accessoires de couronnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">outros acessórios do coronation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">altri accessori di coronation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλλα εξαρτήματα coronation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">otros accesorios de la coronación</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A koronázás egyéb kellékeinek bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">the presentation of other accessories of coronation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">jogar,  kard,  országalma,  filigrán,  </string>
            <string language="en">mace, sword, mound, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Darstellung anderer Zusatzgeräte der Krönung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la présentation d'autres accessoires de 
couronnement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a apresentação de outros acessórios do 
coronation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la presentazione di altri accessori di coronation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η παρουσίαση άλλων εξαρτημάτων coronation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la presentación de otros accesorios de la 
coronación</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskatblüte, Klinge, Damm, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">macis, épée, monticule, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mace, espada, monte, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">macis, spada, monticello, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ράβδος, ξίφος, ανάχωμα, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">macis, espada, montón, filigran</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          </typicalAgeRange>

        <rights>

          </cost>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

      </lom>
    </metadata>
